content: band heel socks ankle socks with unisex design and band heel 3 sizes foot circumference s 7 m 8 l 9 designed by anna zhuravleva © anna zhuravleva 2023 for personal use only page 1 materials yarn any fingering/sport weight sock yarn to match the gauge 175 210 m per 50 g perfect for cotton sock yarn yardage 50-60 g 150 300 m needles notions us 0-1 5 2-2 5 mm needles to match the - 2 stitch markers gauge - darning needle dpns kit or 32 - 40 80-100mm circular - sock blockers optional gauge and size size s 30-33 m 34-37 l 38-42 foot circumference 7 8 9 stitches 48 60 72 - gauge 32 st in 10 cm in stockinette glossary  st s stitch es  sl slip_stitch purl-wise  r round  k2tog knit 2 sts together  rs/ws right/wrong side  p2tog purl 2 sts together  m marker  ssk slip 1 st knit-wise slip 1 st  k knit knit-wise knit these 2 sts together  p - purl through the back loop  ktbl - knit the stitch through the back loop © anna zhuravleva 2023 for personal use only page 2 ribbing use any stretchy cast on method to cast on 48 60 72 sts and join in the round careful not to twist sts twisted german cast on is recommended r1 k1 p1 repeat till the end of the round r2 ktbl1 p1 repeat till the end of the round repeat r2 8 10 12 more times 10 12 14 rounds made leg r1 k5 p1 8 10 12 times repeat r1 7 11 15 more times 8 12 16 rounds made heel flap set up r1 rs work in pattern until 1 st until the end of the round turn set up r ws sl1 yarn in front of the work p 21 27 33 k1 turn put all the sts left aside r1 rs sl 1 yarn in front of the work k 21 27 33 p1 turn r2 ws sl 1 yarn behind the work p 21 27 33 k1 turn repeat r1-r2 5 6 8 more times 12 14 18 row made heel turn r1 rs sl 1 yarn in front of the work k 13 17 21 place m1 ssk k 6 8 10 p1 turn r2 ws sl 1 yarn in front of the work p 12 16 20 place m2 p2tog p 6 8 10 k1 turn r3 rs sl1 yarn behind the work k to m1 slip m1 ssk k to 1 st until the end of the round p1 turn r4 ws sl1 yarn in front of the work p to m2 slip m2 p2tog p to 1 st until the end of the round k1 turn repeat r3-r4 until all sts have been worked 7 9 11 sts on the needles sts between m1 and m1 + 1 st on each side from the decreases line last r rs
